# PlaceDescriptor.PlaceRepresentation.deviceLocation(_:)

**Case**

Physical location in a coordinate system that a device would collect.

## Declaration

```swift
case deviceLocation(CLLocation)
```

## Enumeration cases

- **PlaceDescriptor.PlaceRepresentation.address(_:)**: Full address, as you’d use in postal or administrative scenarios.
- **PlaceDescriptor.PlaceRepresentation.coordinate(_:)**: A physical location described by its latitude and longitude.

items.description: Full address, as you’d use in postal or administrative scenarios.
